ing: 1 (18 ounce) jar apricot preserves (such as SMUCKER'SÂ® Apricot Preserves)
n: Slam Dunk Coconut Shrimp Dipping Sauce
des: "This is our favorite dipping sauce for coconut shrimp. The heat from the horseradish combined with the sweet apricot and citrus pineapple flavors makes this a real slam dunk! This freezes well."
ins: Mix apricot preserves and horseradish in a bowl; stir in pineapple. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.
